entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ThrowingConcurrencyException not triggering with multiple interceptors registered #31361
  • Consider the SQLite timeout mechanism #31359

Closed

  • Should we deprecate the InMemory provider? #31335
  • `System.InvalidOperationException` thrown when adding a `ISingletonInterceptor` #31311
  • EF Core query to Oracle with non unicode column throwing "ORA-12704: character set mismatch" #31306
  • Does EFCore scaffolding using T4 templates support Oracle.EntityFrameworkCore or another alternative? #31305
  • Conditional detection of dotnet ef migrations add command in .csproj #31273
  • How to deal with dictionary items in entity for .ToJson functionality #31257
  • Cannot create DbSet for entity type 'User' since it is of type 'User' but the generic type provided is of type 'User' #31214
  • Query: block projecting json entities/collection at root level in a tracking query #31047
    8.0.0
  • Composite primary key with foreign keys -- zero is treated as non-existing #31212
  • attribute in base class property lost when generating new migrations from inheriting class #31162
  • InvalidCastException upon "MyType[] myArr = DbSet<MyType>.ToArray();" #31143
  • Self reference owned types in EF Core JSON columns #31131
  • ExecuteUpdate throws InvalidOperationException when update owned entity and others properties together #31342
  • I've faced the problem with using ExecuteDelete in the abstract generic class. Can someone explain in what cases ExecuteDelete and ExecuteUpdate cannot be used? Tagret framework is set to .Net 7 #31360
  • Not detecting changes when setting a nullable relationship property to null #31346

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix to #31047 - Query: block projecting json entities/collection at root level in a tracking query #31048
  • Parse default value literals for SQLite #31127

Updated

  • Add NativeAOT support to the compiled relational model #31333
  • Metadata for primitive collection mapping #31351
  • Stop instantiating Stopwatch #31348
